requestParams.name: fans_id
requestParams.desc: 粉丝id（mobile 或 fans_id选其一，另者置为0，都填以mobile为准）

requestParams.name: fans_type
requestParams.desc: 粉丝类型（自有粉丝: fans_type = 1）

requestParams.name: mobile
requestParams.desc: 手机号（mobile 或 fans_id选其一，另者置为0，都填以mobile为准）

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['fans_id']=0
params['fans_type']=1
params['mobile']="15860817746"
params['page_no']=1
params['page_size']=10

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.salesman.customers.get', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'0', 'fans_type' => '1', 'mobile' => '15860817746', 'page_no' => '1', 'page_size' => '10', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->get($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '

name: get
scenarios: 获取分销员客户列表，需申请高级权限方可调用。
